parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID. You can call the DescribeDBInstances operation to query the instance ID.

parameters.name: ExternalReplication
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the native replication feature. Valid values:

*   **ON**
*   **OFF**

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the instance. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~26243~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The resource group ID. You can leave this parameter empty.
